attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the rate of the minimum wage is causing people to get paid to little, and with council tax, food costs, rent etc soon no British person will afford to live.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/povertywages/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
